Package uk.ac.aber.cs221.gp12.game

Class TreasureIsland

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.aber.cs221.gp12.game.GameObject
uk.ac.aber.cs221.gp12.game.Island
uk.ac.aber.cs221.gp12.game.TreasureIsland
public class TreasureIsland extends Island
This class is responsible for creating and setting up the information for the Treasure Island to be formed.
Version:
1.0 - Initial development of class.
Author:
Jason Weller (jaw125), Behrooz Rezvani (ber39)

    • getChanceCards

      public Queue<ChanceCard> getChanceCards()
      This method gets the queue of chance cards present on Treasure Island.
      Returns:
      chance cards present in Treasure Island at player state turn.

      This method gets a list of the treasures present on Treasure Island.
      Returns:
      treasure present in Treasure Island at player's turn.

    • takeChanceCard

      public void takeChanceCard​(Player player)
      This method decides whether a player can or can't take a chance card, and if so, which chance card they'll take.
      Parameters:
      player - taking the chance card.

    • getTreasureTypes

      public List<TreasureDetail> getTreasureTypes()
      This method gets a list of all types of treasure on the island, used for players deciding what treasure to take
      Returns:
      the value/type of treasure they're taking

    • getTreasureOfType

      public Treasure getTreasureOfType​(TreasureDetail treasureDetail)
      This method decides what type of treasure a player is taking. This also affects the value of the treasure the player will have in its ship.
      Parameters:
      treasureDetail - - kind of treasure in the island.
      Returns:
      the kind of treasure the player gets.

    • takeTreasure

      public Treasure takeTreasure​(TreasureDetail treasureDetail)
      This method allow the player to take treasure from Treasure Island.
      Parameters:
      treasureDetail - - The treasure's features.
      Returns:
      the kind of treasure to take.

    • hasTreasure

      public boolean hasTreasure()
      This method checks whether there's any treasure on Treasure Island.
      Returns:
      true if there is treasure on the island, false if there isn't.
